spiritsExplanation:

The video is also identified as Structured & Disciplined with a score of 0.65. Soothing & Restorative and Outdoor & Adventure are excluded due to the indoor setting, equipment-free design concentrating on intensity rather than relaxation or nature. Flow & Rhythm is not selected, as the content focuses more on structured sequences than continuous flow and music-driven pacing.
